rows.label: qev060602_MSG0009
rows.name:
Have you spoken with Orleron? *fsssh*
Quite an impressive young Zaruboggan, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev060602_SEL0031
rows.name: Praise the boy's dedication.

rows.label: qev060602_JNK0040
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev060602_SEL0041
rows.name: Say that he seemed unreliable.

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0010
rows.name:
Excellent! *fsssh* I am certain he would be thrilled to
know that someone of your stature acknowledges him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0011
rows.name:
I am also quite proud my devoltanizing led to coughing
up so capable an individual. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0012
rows.name:
*fsssh* Growing up in the presence of someone
with such strict standards will only encourage him
to greatness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0013
rows.name:
I am also quite proud my devoltanizing led to coughing
up so capable an individual. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0014
rows.name: ...Hmm? Orleron asked you to find him a gorkwa?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0015
rows.name: *fsssh* Mmm. That is a difficult request.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0016
rows.name:
On our homeworld of Bedun, Golbogga left behind a
vast number of gorkwas. *fsssh* Shortly after birth,
we would leave on a journey to find our own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0017
rows.name:
But we cannot expect such bounty on Mira, for this
place is far removed from Golbogga's legacy. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0018
rows.name:
We have all been struggling to get by with our current
gorkwas, and repairing them as needed. *fsssh*
I fear we have no spares.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0019
rows.name:
Though that leaves him unable to properly devoltanize,
and ultimately condemns him to death... *fsssh*
Hmm, quite the pickle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_JNK0050
rows.name: Scold

rows.label: qev060602_SEL0051
rows.name: Lash out at Arsenican over his lackadaisical attitude.

rows.label: qev060602_JNK0060
rows.name: Mourn

rows.label: qev060602_SEL0061
rows.name:
Weep for the fact that a newborn life may
be snuffed out before it has begun.

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0020
rows.name:
What a novel response. *fsssh* It seems your
understanding of life is quite different than ours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0021
rows.name:
Still, you have my sincere thanks for caring so deeply
about one of my kind. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0022
rows.name:
Indeed! To lose an inheritor of Golbogga's will to
devoltanize an impure world would be disappointing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0023
rows.name:
*fsssh* Hmm? That is not the sort of loss you were
grieving?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0024
rows.name:
You humans remain a mystery to us. *fsssh*
It seems your understanding of life is fundamentally
different than ours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0025
rows.name: But, hmmm... *fsssh* Hmmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0026
rows.name:
*fsssh* Actually, there may be one gorkwa that I know
of. And if it is still there, Orleron may be able to claim
it as his own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0027
rows.name:
This was some time ago, mind you, but while we were
wandering the land, one of our number fell from a cliff.
*fsssh* He did not survive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0028
rows.name:
His gorkwa may have been destroyed in the fall,
but the possibility exists that it is salvageable. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0029
rows.name:
From where he fell in Sylvalum, it would likely have
dropped into the Abyss Reservoir. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0030
rows.name:
Please find it if you can, brave BLADE. *fsssh*
Help Orleron to know adulthood.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0053
rows.name:
*fsssh* The gorkwa of the one who fell should be in
Sylvalum's Abyss Reservoir.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0054
rows.name:
Please retrieve it and see it to Orleron,
that the child may know adulthood. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0055
rows.name:
Lately, Orleron seems much troubled over a human
called Vera. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0056
rows.name:
I cannot understand his fixation on such an individual.
*fsssh* Perhaps you could speak with him?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0057
rows.name: Orleron is all but human now... *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060602_MSG0058
rows.name:
As a fellow Zaruboggan, I want to offer him my
understanding. *fsssh* Yet whenever we speak,
everything out of his mouth is so foreign.[ST:wait ]
